title: The Missing Link: Exploring the Relationship Between Transformational Leadership and Change in team members in Construction. (arXiv:2305.13121v1 [econ.GN])
abstract: This study aimed to investigate how transformational leadership affects team processes, mediated by change in team members. A self-administered questionnaire was distributed to construction project team members in Abuja and Kaduna, and statistical analysis revealed a significant positive relationship between transformational leadership and team processes, transformational leadership and change in team members, changes in team members and team processes, and changes in team members mediating the relationship between transformational leadership and team processes. Future studies should consider cultural differences.
context:
Title: The Missing Link: Exploring the Relationship Between Transformational Leadership and Change in team members in Construction. (arXiv:2305.13121v1 [econ.GN])
Abstract: This study aimed to investigate how transformational leadership affects team processes, mediated by change in team members. A self-administered questionnaire was distributed to construction project team members in Abuja and Kaduna, and statistical analysis revealed a significant positive relationship between transformational leadership and team processes, transformational leadership and change in team members, changes in team members and team processes, and changes in team members mediating the relationship between transformational leadership and team processes. Future studies should consider cultural differences.
translated_title: 普通领导与变革领导之间的关系：建筑团队中变革领导与团队成员变化的探究
translated_abstract: 该研究旨在研究变革领导如何通过团队成员变化影响团队流程。研究通过向阿布贾和卡杜纳的建筑项目团队成员分发自我管理问卷，利用统计分析揭示了普通领导和团队流程、变革领导和团队成员变化、团队成员变化和团队流程之间存在明显正向关系，变革领导与团队流程之间存在中介作用的团队成员变化。未来的研究应考虑文化差异。
tldr: 该研究探究了变革领导如何通过引起团队成员变化来影响团队流程，发现普通领导与团队流程、变革领导与团队成员变化、团队成员变化与团队流程之间存在显著的正向关系，并发现团队成员变化在变革领导和团队流程之间具有中介作用。
en_tdlr: This study explores how transformational leadership affects team processes through changing team members, revealing significant positive relationships between transformational leadership and team processes, transformational leadership and change in team members, changes in team members and team processes, as well as changes in team members mediating the relationship between transformational leadership and team processes. Future studies should consider cultural differences.
